# Intro

This doc shows how to add space on top of titles to give some more breath to the document

# Loading a css file

First you have to load an external css sheet called `style.css`. And then

# Fill the stylesheet 

And then put something like this in the stylesheet:

```         
h1, .h1, h2, .h2, h3, .h3 {
  margin-top: 84px;
}
```
